instruction: Fill in the blanks for the given paragraph.
input: Paragraph: In the world of technology, ____ has become an essential part of any business. Companies use it to store their data, share information, and even collaborate on projects. It helps businesses to be more ____, efficient, and ____.
output: In the world of technology, cloud computing has become an essential part of any business. Companies use it to store their data, share information, and even collaborate on projects. It helps businesses to be more productive, efficient, and cost-effective.
